alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:39PM CDT until August 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HAWKINS...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN COCKE...WEST CENTRAL GREENE AND HAMBLEN COUNTIES... At 1139 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Russellville, or 7 miles southeast of Morristown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morristown, White Pine, Baneberry, Parrottsville, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Bybee, Alpha, and Lowland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 420 and 424. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
